Modern mercenaries - well, you see, what you have now is a mixture of private contractors, security guards, soldiers of fortune, guns for hire, employees of private military and companies because private military and security companies now are the modern reincarnation of a long lineage of private providers of physical force.
The use of mercenaries in the centuries before are being replaced now more and more by the employees of private military and security companies, and they do the same thing.
